replies.msg: I’m going to Taiwan with my friend today. I’m waiting for my friend on the corner outside Times Square. He lives round the corner so it’ll take him five minutes to come. Meanwhile a pedestrian cane and asked me whether there was any medical centre nearby because he had been ill with heatstroke. I told him that there were a clinic and a pharmacy just around the corner. As summer is just round the corner, people suffer from heatstroke more easily. There’re many ways to prevent heatstroke during summer. At home sitting in a recliner or an armchair or on a sofa rather than in a chair or on a stool can work wonders for your body. Eating a balanced diet of veggies and fruits and a little meat works wonders for your health. Exercise and meditation can do wonders for mind and body.
